title: VPN connected but internal resources not accessible
root_cause: Internal routes not pushed to VPN client
resolution_steps: Verify routes configured on VPN server
Update VPN server to push internal network routes
validation_steps: Confirm traffic flows through VPN tunnel

title: VPN authentication failure
root_cause: Invalid user credentials or expired VPN certificate

title: VPN tunnel disconnects intermittently
root_cause: Unstable network connection or VPN keepalive misconfiguration

title: VPN connected but DNS resolution fails
symptoms: Cannot resolve internal hostnames over VPN
root_cause: DNS servers not pushed to VPN client
resolution_steps: Verify DNS server settings on VPN server
Configure VPN to push internal DNS servers

title: Split tunneling misconfiguration blocks internal access
symptoms: Some internal services unreachable over VPN
root_cause: Split tunneling enabled without required internal routes
resolution_steps: Add missing internal routes or disable split tunneling

title: VPN traffic fails due to MTU mismatch
symptoms: VPN connects but some applications fail
root_cause: MTU size mismatch between VPN client and server
resolution_steps: Reduce MTU size on VPN client
Apply recommended MTU settings on VPN server

title: VPN connected but traffic routes outside tunnel
root_cause: Default route not set to VPN interface
resolution_steps: Check routing table on VPN client
Update VPN configuration to route traffic via tunnel

title: VPN server unreachable
root_cause: VPN server down or network path blocked
resolution_steps: Ping VPN server to verify reachability
Check firewall rules allowing VPN traffic
